00021 DPM::DPM(int M,int N) : Matrix(M*(M - 1)*(M - 2)/6) {
00022    
00023    this->N = N;
00024    this->M = M;
00025    this->n = M*(M - 1)*(M - 2)/6;
00026 
00027    if(counter == 0){
00028 
00029       //allocatie van s2dp
00030       s2dp = new int ** [M];
00031 
00032       for(int i = 0;i < M;++i){
00033 
00034          s2dp[i] = new int * [M];
00035 
00036          for(int j = 0;j < M;++j)
00037             s2dp[i][j] = new int [M];
00038 
00039       }
00040 
00041       //allocatie van dp2s
00042       dp2s = new int * [n];
00043 
00044       for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00045          dp2s[i] = new int [3];
00046 
00047       //initialisatie van de twee arrays
00048       int teller = 0;
00049 
00050       for(int a = 0;a < M;++a)
00051          for(int b = a + 1;b < M;++b)
00052             for(int c = b + 1;c < M;++c){
00053 
00054                s2dp[a][b][c] = teller;
00055 
00056                dp2s[teller][0] = a;
00057                dp2s[teller][1] = b;
00058                dp2s[teller][2] = c;
00059 
00060                ++teller;
00061 
00062             }
00063 
00064    }
00065 
00066    ++counter;
00067 
00068 }

00127 DPM::~DPM(){
00128 
00129    if(counter == 1){
00130 
00131       for(int i = 0;i < M;++i){
00132 
00133          for(int j = 0;j < M;++j)
00134             delete [] s2dp[i][j];
00135 
00136          delete [] s2dp[i];
00137 
00138       }
00139 
00140       delete [] s2dp;
00141 
00142       for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00143          delete [] dp2s[i];
00144 
00145       delete [] dp2s;
00146 
00147    }
00148 
00149    --counter;
00150 
00151 }

00165 double DPM::operator()(int a,int b,int c,int d,int e,int z) const{
00166 
00167    //eerst kijken of er geen indices gelijk zijn:
00168    if(a == b || a == c || b == c)
00169       return 0;
00170 
00171    if(d == e || d == z || e == z)
00172       return 0;
00173 
00174    //dan kijken wel dp index met welke fase moet genomen worden:
00175    //eerst voor de i
00176    int i;
00177 
00178    int phase = 1;
00179 
00180    if(a < b){
00181 
00182       if(b < c)
00183          i = s2dp[a][b][c];
00184       else if(c < a)
00185          i = s2dp[c][a][b];
00186       else{
00187 
00188          i = s2dp[a][c][b];
00189          phase *= -1;
00190 
00191       }
00192 
00193    }
00194    else{
00195 
00196       if(a < c){
00197 
00198          i = s2dp[b][a][c];
00199          phase *= -1;
00200 
00201       }
00202       else if(c < b){
00203 
00204          i = s2dp[c][b][a];
00205          phase *= -1;
00206 
00207       }
00208       else
00209          i = s2dp[b][c][a];
00210 
00211    }
00212 
00213    //idem voor j maar met d e z
00214    int j;
00215 
00216    if(d < e){
00217 
00218       if(e < z)
00219          j = s2dp[d][e][z];
00220       else if(z < d)
00221          j = s2dp[z][d][e];
00222       else{
00223 
00224          j = s2dp[d][z][e];
00225          phase *= -1;
00226 
00227       }
00228 
00229    }
00230    else{
00231 
00232       if(d < z){
00233 
00234          j = s2dp[e][d][z];
00235          phase *= -1;
00236 
00237       }
00238       else if(z < e){
00239 
00240          j = s2dp[z][e][d];
00241          phase *= -1;
00242 
00243       }
00244       else
00245          j = s2dp[e][z][d];
00246 
00247    }
00248 
00249    return phase*(*this)(i,j);
00250 
00251 }

00253 ostream &operator<<(ostream &output,DPM &dpm_p){
00254 
00255    for(int i = 0;i < dpm_p.n;++i)
00256       for(int j = 0;j < dpm_p.n;++j){
00257 
00258          output << i << "\t" << j << "\t|\t" << dpm_p.dp2s[i][0] << "\t" << dpm_p.dp2s[i][1] << "\t" << dpm_p.dp2s[i][2]
00259 
00260             << "\t" << dpm_p.dp2s[j][0] << "\t" << dpm_p.dp2s[j][1] << "\t" << dpm_p.dp2s[j][2] << "\t" << dpm_p(i,j) << endl;
00261 
00262       }
00263 
00264    return output;
00265 
00266 }

00299 void DPM::T(TPM &tpm){
00300 
00301    SPM spm(tpm);
00302 
00303    double ward = 2.0*tpm.trace()/(N*(N - 1.0));
00304 
00305    int a,b,c,d,e,z;
00306 
00307    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00308 
00309       a = dp2s[i][0];
00310       b = dp2s[i][1];
00311       c = dp2s[i][2];
00312 
00313       for(int j = i;j < n;++j){
00314 
00315          d = dp2s[j][0];
00316          e = dp2s[j][1];
00317          z = dp2s[j][2];
00318 
00319          (*this)(i,j) = 0;
00320 
00321          //no particle stuk
00322          if(i == j)
00323             (*this)(i,i) = ward;
00324 
00325          if(a == d){
00326 
00327             //tp stuk
00328             (*this)(i,j) += tpm(b,c,e,z);
00329 
00330             //4 sp stukken
00331             if(c == z)
00332                (*this)(i,j) -= spm(e,b);
00333 
00334             if(b == z)
00335                (*this)(i,j) += spm(c,e);
00336 
00337             if(c == e)
00338                (*this)(i,j) += spm(b,z);
00339 
00340             if(b == e)
00341                (*this)(i,j) -= spm(c,z);
00342 
00343          }
00344 
00345          if(b == d){
00346 
00347             //tp stuk
00348             (*this)(i,j) -= tpm(a,c,e,z);
00349 
00350             //2 sp stukken
00351             if(c == z)
00352                (*this)(i,j) += spm(a,e);
00353 
00354             if(c == e)
00355                (*this)(i,j) -= spm(a,z);
00356 
00357          }
00358 
00359          if(b == e){
00360 
00361             //tp stuk
00362             (*this)(i,j) += tpm(a,c,d,z);
00363 
00364             //sp stuk
00365             if(c == z)
00366                (*this)(i,j) -= spm(a,d);
00367 
00368          }
00369 
00370          //nu enkel nog tp stukken
00371          if(c == z)
00372             (*this)(i,j) += tpm(a,b,d,e);
00373 
00374          if(b == z)
00375             (*this)(i,j) -= tpm(a,c,d,e);
00376 
00377          if(c == e)
00378             (*this)(i,j) -= tpm(a,b,d,z);
00379 
00380          if(c == d)
00381             (*this)(i,j) += tpm(a,b,e,z);
00382 
00383       }
00384    }
00385 
00386    //niet vergeten!
00387    this->symmetrize();
00388 
00389 }
